You're point? Heels may be tough to run in but it isn't unheard of.[/bq]
Do prefer to use heels in the middle of a jungle?
Do you prefer to use heels while running for your life?
Do you prefer to use heels while big ass trex is chasing you?
My point is: That was absurd. And like Owen said: "You will survive two minutes with those heels out there"

topics.body:
Another question for those who watched JW:

How in hell nobody knew that Indominus Rex can change color and temperature?! How a special control team that specializes in controlling escaped dinosaurs couldn't know that Indominus can change aspect? 

InGEN created a dinosaur without telling what the dinosaur is made? The people who works in Jurassic World never realized that Indominus can do that?
topics.author: 5239db6da4c72d22d9000358
